rows.title: Body Scan

transcript.eng:
Sit down, close your eyes, and listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
Notice how you feel. When you are ready, open your eyes. 
Try this whenver you are feeling stressed and you need a break to reconnect.

rows.transcript:
Sit down, close your eyes, and listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
Notice how you feel. When you are ready, open your eyes. 
Try this whenver you are feeling stressed and you need a break to reconnect.

text_1.eng: Take a moment to check in with yourself.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!

rows.text_1: Take a moment to check in with yourself.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself 

We often forget to take care of ourselves, but it's really important, especially if you are a parent!

When we lower our stress and treat ourselves kindly, it helps both us and our children.

media_title.eng: How does taking care of myself help me and my family?

media_transcript.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems, and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves every day, so we are ready to handle those times well and stay calm. 

When we are calm, we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself 

We often forget to take care of ourselves, but it's really important, especially if you are a parent!

When we lower our stress and treat ourselves kindly, it helps both us and our children.
rows.media_title: How does taking care of myself help me and my family?
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings, everyone.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems, and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves every day, so we are ready to handle those times well and stay calm. 

When we are calm, we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.

character_1_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.name, come and play with me with my dolls!

character_2_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_mother.name manages to take care of herself when life gets a bit too much.
rows.character_1_text: @data.characters.f1_mother.name, come and play with me with my dolls!
rows.character_2_text: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

character_1_text.eng: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

rows.character_1_text: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

character_1_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

rows.character_1_text: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.name did a few things that can also help us when we are feeling overwhelmed.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Have another look at @data.characters.f1_mother.name’s facial expression and thoughts. She is feeling stressed and worried.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Yes, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels stressed and worried about everything happening in her life.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Yes, @data.characters.f1_mother.name feels stressed and worried about everything happening in her life.

quiz_2_question.eng: What does @data.characters.f1_mother.name do to manage her stress?

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: Exactly. Play helped @data.characters.f1_mother.name to connect with @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name and forget about her worries for a moment.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: That’s right! @data.characters.f1_mother.name recognises she is trying her best in difficult circumstances. She also took a pause, rewarded herself with a quiet cup of tea, and made a plan to spend time with a friend.

quiz_2_feedback_4.eng: Exactly, @data.characters.f1_mother.name creates a moment in the evening to enjoy a cup of tea by herself. Having this moment also helps her to come up with other ways to get support.  She also took a pause, praised herself, played with her daughter, and made a plan to spend time with a friend.

quiz_2_feedback_5.eng: Yes, when we isolate ourselves, problems will start to feel even bigger. Reaching out to a friend can help. She also took a pause, praised herself, played with her daughter, and rewarded herself with a quiet cup of tea.

quiz_3_question.eng: How is @data.characters.f1_mother.name feeling when she does something small for herself?

quiz_3_feedback_1.eng: Exactly! She is able to feel calmer for a moment and think more positively.

quiz_3_feedback_2.eng: She may still have the same worries, but she also recognises she is trying her best and others are there to support her.

quiz_3_feedback_3.eng: Have another look at what @data.characters.f1_mother.name does. After taking care of herself, she feels more positive and hopeful

section_1_text.eng: Taking a pause helps us to feel and respond calmer in stressful moments.

section_1_extra_text.eng:
Even taking a few deep breaths makes a big difference. 

By staying calm instead of reacting strongly, you can also prevent a lot of problems!

section_2_text.eng: Take a moment and think of one thing YOU did well recently. Say it aloud if you can: "Well done for …"

section_2_extra_text.eng:
Being a parent can be hard. Praise yourself for trying your best. 

Identify negative thoughts when they start and decide if they are true or helpful. If not, find positive thoughts to replace them with. 

For example, instead of “I am a bad parent” say “I am feeling overwhelmed right now, but I am doing the best I can and I will talk to a friend for support”.

section_3_text.eng: What makes you happy? Find small things that you can do every day to care for yourself.

section_3_extra_text.eng: Doing something you enjoy will give you a short break. It will help you to think more clearly and care better for your family. Caring for yourself = caring your family!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Whenever you can, pause, praise and reward yourself. And remember to connect with your family and friends - you are not alone.

Care for yourself every day. You matter!

media_title.eng: How it helped a parent like you:

media_transcript.eng:
For me as a parent, it was almost impossible to find time for myself. I was always busy taking care of everyone else. Through @global.app_name, I realised how important it is to take care of myself. It helps me AND my family! 

Having a moment for myself helps me to breathe and notice how I feel. Even five minutes to have a cup of tea makes a big difference. Now I can deal with my stress better.
